Blocks.Text: furiously on the road. Not a sign of
the bus. He passed The Traveller 's
Joy. At last he cought up Mr. Roberts,
as he shot part. His spirits were rising.
He had seen no sign of an accident.
Therefore Mr. Roberts must have been mirtahen.
He would find the bus rafe and round in
Llangnol, and his dear Morfydd quietly
